value.title: StarCraft 2: "GAME OF THE YEAR"... According to a Viewer!
value.excerpt: Two viewer submitted games in StarCraft 2. A crazy Diamond league match of Protoss versus Zerg and then a Platinum league game of Terran versus Protoss. If you have an awesome game of SC2 you'd like me to cast, you can submit it to replays@lowko.tv.  Painful SC2 game 00:00 Game of the year? 15:24  Support

value.title: StarCraft 2: GAME OF THE YEAR! (So Far)
value.excerpt: Goblin versus Krystianer in an epic game of professional StarCraft 2. It's a bit early to call it the best game of SC2 of this year already, but it surely is the best so far. In this Protoss versus Protoss neither player ever manages to secure a solid economy so an intense micro battle is the only option.

value.excerpt: Best-of-5 series of high level StarCraft 2 between GuMiho (Terran) and Ragnarok (Zerg). This match is the grand finals of the ESL Open Cup 158 Korea. value.title: StarCraft 2: herO's OVERPOWERED(?) Mass Gateway Protoss vs Zerg! (Best-of-5)
value.excerpt: A best-of-5 series of professional StarCraft 2 between herO (Protoss) and soO (Zerg). Recently in the Protoss versus Zerg matchup, we have seen a lot of changes. This is the current Zerg versus Protoss StarCraft 2 meta. From a turtling Sky Toss based approach, we now see a very heavy focus on Gateway

value.title: StarCraft 2: INSANE GAME - Mass Tactical Nukes! (Maru vs Zest)
value.excerpt: Another amazing game of top-level StarCraft 2. This time around it is time for a Terran versus Protoss that goes to the late game. Mass Gateway, Command Center, Sky Toss, Sky Terran and Tactical Nukes are all part of this epic match.  Zest vs Dark: https://youtu.be/mUG5ryGpiV8  Support my work on Patreon:

value.title: StarCraft 2: Serral Plays The BROOD LORD Micro Trick! (Cure vs Serral)
value.excerpt: Long macro game of professional StarCraft 2 between Serral, the current SC2 World Champion, and Cure. In this match Cure decides to open up with a Terran turtle style. He maxes out on Terran Mech (Thors, Siege Tanks, Liberators and Hellbats) after opening up with Battlecruisers and eventually transitions
